body:
Can you actually make this a PartialTensorShape? That's the only way we can get coverage of unknown-rank inputs (TensorShape = {} corresponds to a scalar, but PartialTensorShape() is unknown rank).

Once you do that, manually specify a scalar shape for BasicLoop or one of the other tests so we get coverage of known shapes working too.
body_html:

body_text:
Can you actually make this a PartialTensorShape? That's the only way we can get coverage of unknown-rank inputs (TensorShape = {} corresponds to a scalar, but PartialTensorShape() is unknown rank).
Once you do that, manually specify a scalar shape for BasicLoop or one of the other tests so we get coverage of known shapes working too.
